channel.title: Help me with amulet of glory please?

item.title: Help me with amulet of glory please?
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

Umm I got these codes for amulet of gloryâ€¦

if (item2ID3 == 1712) {
sendMessage("You rub the amulet...");
sendFrame164(2492);
sendFrame126("Where would you like to teleport to?", 2493);
sendFrame126("Edgeville", 2494);
sendFrame126("Karamja", 2495);
sendFrame126("Draynor Village", 2496);
sendFrame126("Al Kharid", 2497);
sendFrame126("Nowhere", 2498);
}

if (item2ID3 == 1714) {
sendMessage("You rub the amulet...");
sendFrame164(2492);
sendFrame126("Where would you like to teleport to?", 2493);
sendFrame126("Edgeville", 2494);
sendFrame126("Karamja", 2495);
sendFrame126("Draynor Village", 2496);
sendFrame126("Al Kharid", 2497);
sendFrame126("Nowhere", 2498);
}

if (item2ID3 == 1716) {
sendMessage("You rub the amulet...");
sendFrame164(2492);
sendFrame126("Where would you like to teleport to?", 2493);
sendFrame126("Edgeville", 2494);
sendFrame126("Karamja", 2495);
sendFrame126("Draynor Village", 2496);
sendFrame126("Al Kharid", 2497);
sendFrame126("Nowhere", 2498);
}

if (item2ID3 == 1718) {
sendMessage("You rub the amulet...");
sendFrame164(2492);
sendFrame126("Where would you like to teleport to?", 2493);
sendFrame126("Edgeville", 2494);
sendFrame126("Karamja", 2495);
sendFrame126("Draynor Village", 2496);
sendFrame126("Al Kharid", 2497);
sendFrame126("Nowhere", 2498);
}
case 9190: //Edge	
teleportToX = 3087;		
teleportToY = 3497;		
heightLevel = 0;
RemoveAllWindows();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;		
break;

case 9191: //Karamja
teleportToX = 2914;	
teleportToY = 3177;	
heightLevel = 0;
RemoveAllWindows();	
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;		

case 9192: //Draynor
teleportToX = 3104;	
teleportToY = 3249;	
heightLevel = 0;
RemoveAllWindows();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;

case 9193: //Al Kharid
teleportToX = 3293;	
teleportToY = 3178;	
heightLevel = 0;
RemoveAllWindows();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;

case 9194:
RemoveAllWindows();
closeInterface();
break;

Does anyone know were I can place it please?
